name: wunss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cpw(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(cpw(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cpw(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(c2), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(c2), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cpw(c2), c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))

comment: A weak universe is closed under subsets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
